segments.text: Will you tell me the situation ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I was in my friend's room talking for an hour of so .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I came back to my room and found that my suitcase was open and my camera and five hundred dollars in cash inside the wallet were gone .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I'm afraid you must give up the cash.Are you insured ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes , this is my overseas travel accident insurance card .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I'll make a report for you and please claim this to the insurance company with this report .
segments.speaker: S1
